alert.note: Alert for Bent; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:35PM MDT until July 20 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LAS ANIMAS AND SOUTHWESTERN BENT COUNTIES... At 634 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Higbee, or 21 miles southeast of North La Junta, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, torrential rainfall, and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
